column4: Hi, wonder if anyone can help: I'm having problems getting my Toshiba Satellite laptop to sleep - all that happens is that the screen goes to black (backlight still on) with a blinking cursor -- and the only apparent way to get out of that is a hard reboot
I have 2gb of swap space on the hard drive, if that's what you mean
yes...about that i was questioning..i don`t know why:)i am noob:)just at mine pc cant go to hibenate because i don`t have enough swap
